comments:

Unfortunately, this looks like an issue with the platform, however, I'll start it with us since it is impacting the facet-based project wizards:

Unfortunately, I don't have any additional info to provide and haven't been able to repro...
Well, I guess for now, I'm going to return this as unreproducible.  If you hit again, and can provide more info, we can reopen.

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old is is assumed its dup, invalid, or worksforme resolution is no longer in qustion and the bugzilla needs no further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error in this case.
